name: Glacephone's Basics In Pokeject Moves
description:
This is the Glacephone basic that used the map called "Lucky schoolhouse" to make. Yeah and also the map is also made by me still. Also there's not much change in this one though except that I just added 1 new decoration thing outside.

Credits:

Paulor94 - Map creator and also the creator of this mod as well

mystman12 - Original creator of Baldi's basic

cutiepiefluttershy53 - The owner of all the sprites and texture

Characters are voiced by:

Glacephone voiced by Kwysocki243
Leafy Tube voiced by Yin-Yangll
UmbreS voiced by nolansmith
Jolphy voiced by Garbi80
Hearty voiced by PuffyGarry 
Cupcake voiced by Ashton Games
Plandy voiced by PVZ3456
